name: Norum Vapor CD File
summary: Learn about .VAPORCD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Norum Vapor users may copy data from CDs to VAPORCD files for various purposes, including archiving, backing up, or sharing the CD content.

description: A VAPORCD file is a CD-ROM disc image created by Norum Vapor, a discontinued disc imaging program. It is a virtual copy of a CD, storing the exact data copied from the original disc, including its file structure, contents, and metadata.
